cards.question: a
cards.answer: any interjection, used to emphasize a word for emotion

cards.question: akesi
cards.answer: reptile, amphibian, scaly and/or crawling creature

cards.question: ala
cards.answer: No, not, nothing, or simply negation in general. Used to form yes/no questions

cards.question: alasa
cards.answer: hunt, search, or forage. Try to do something

cards.question: ale
cards.answer: all, entirety, everything. When used as a number, 100

cards.question: anpa
cards.answer: bottom, underside, below. lowly, humble, defeat

cards.question: ante
cards.answer: other, altered, modified, changed, difference

cards.question: anu
cards.answer: a participle to seperate multiple possibilities, replacing another participle. Or just the word 'or'.

cards.question: awen
cards.answer: stay, remain, pause, protect, keep safe, continue, (when used as a preverb) continue to...

cards.question: e
cards.answer: particle that marks the start of a direct object

cards.question: en
cards.answer: participle that seperates multiple subjects

cards.question: esun
cards.answer: trade, barter, echange, shop, buy. bazaar, fair, place of business, mall

cards.question: ijo
cards.answer: thing, object, matter, phenomonan

cards.question: ike
cards.answer: bad quality, such as: evil, malice, harmful, bad, unpleasant, complicated

cards.question: ilo
cards.answer: tool, implement, machine, device, doohicky, gadget

cards.question: insa
cards.answer: inside, center, middle, internal, midpoint, between

cards.question: jaki
cards.answer: disgusting, unsanitary, toxic, repulsive, rotten

cards.question: jan
cards.answer: human, person, somebody

cards.question: jelo
cards.answer: yellow, amber, golden, basically anything between green-yellow and yellow-orange

cards.question: jo
cards.answer: hold, carry, possess, contain

cards.question: kala
cards.answer: fish, swimming creature, marine animal, sea crature

cards.question: kalama
cards.answer: to produce sound, e.g. thunder, drum, laugh, sing, play an instrument, literally anything that has to do with making noise
